title: Add streak statistics
description:
Add stats around streaks to the dashboard/statistics:
- Longest day-to-day QSO streak
- Longest POTA activation streak
- Longest streak per mode
- Longest streak per band
- Other interesting streak metrics

title: Fix activity grid month labels showing as ellipses
description: Cell width too narrow for month abbreviations - need different approach

title: Fix partial downloads from QRZ and LoFi
description:
Users report partial downloads:
- User with ~14k QSOs on QRZ only downloads 2,000
- Similar partial downloads from LoFi
- Must ensure ALL QSOs are downloaded

Also: Ham2K LoFi requires download to be enabled via Discord (KI2D). If 0 items downloaded, user likely needs to enable this.

title: QSO Map View
description:
Add a map view to the dashboard showing QSO locations. Requirements:
- Button on dashboard to navigate to map pane
- Filter QSOs by date range, bands, parks, etc.
- Toggle option for arcs between QSO endpoints
- Performance critical: cannot make API calls for every operator's location
- Use default system MapKit

title: Add date labels to activity grid
description: Show month labels below the activity grid to indicate time periods

title: Fix activity grid month label positioning
description: Month labels are rendering at the end instead of aligned with columns

title: Fix POTA download timeouts
description:
POTA.app downloads timeout for users with many jobs (477+ reported).

Current approach downloads all jobs, then all activations, then all QSOs - this times out.

Solution: Batch jobs/activations and their QSOs for partial downloads that can continue/resume.

title: Dashboard enhancements
description: Add enhanced dashboard with LoFi card, QSO statistics, and GitHub-style activity indicator

title: Add QSO statistics to dashboard cards
description: Show count, states worked, DX entities on each destination card

title: Add GitHub-style activity indicator
description: Show contribution-style grid showing QSO activity over time

title: Improve LoFi card visibility
description: Make LoFi card more prominent on dashboard
